name: Hugs'n'Ghosts
description:
You decide to visit a haunted house on Halloween. What could possibly go wrong? Lonely ghosts who don't want to let you leave, that's what. Navigate mazes in the dark to find your way out!

Made with Game Maker 8.1 for Shock and Awwww Jam, which goal was to make cute games with jumpscares.

Warning: Jumpscares (duh)

Controls

Arrow keys: move

Escape: close the game

F4: toggle fullscreen

Music and sounds used

https://opengameart.org/content/creaky-light-wooden-door

https://opengameart.org/content/key-pickup-2

https://opengameart.org/content/creepy

https://opengameart.org/content/victoriana-loop

Background image

Spooky Vectors by Vecteezy
